sentences.en: All that stuff about catching giant fish was just a bit of poetic licence.
sentences.cn: 有关捕捉大鱼的所有内容只是一点破格罢了。

sentences.en: As a poetic version of a disintegrating world, this one pleased him.
sentences.cn: 作为世界崩溃论在文学上的表现, 他非常喜欢这个学说.

sentences.en: He discoursed upon the poetic style of John Keats.
sentences.cn: 他讲了约翰·济慈的诗歌风格.

sentences.en: Her expression was aloof, poetic, rhapsodical.
sentences.cn: 她的表情是超然的, 诗意的, 狂放无羁的.

sentences.en: His translation is exceptional in its poetic quality.
His writing is rather self - consciously poetic.
sentences.cn: 他的作品富有诗意,但颇不自然.

sentences.en: I'm drawn to the poetic, sensuous qualities of her paintings.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢她的画中那种充满诗意、赏心悦目的特性。

sentences.en: It'sharpened the poetic sensibility of two generations.
sentences.cn: 它提高了两代人对诗的敏感力.

sentences.en: Nikolai Demidenko gave an exciting yet poetic performance.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉·杰米坚科的表演激动人心且富有诗意。

sentences.en: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches.
sentences.cn: 贴切的引语和珠玑般的诗句为他的演说词增添文采.

sentences.en: The piece ends with a truly poetic slow movement.
sentences.cn: 乐曲以非常富有诗意的旋律缓缓结束.

sentences.en: The scholar discoursed at great length on the poetic style of John Keats.
sentences.cn: 那位学者详细讲述了约翰·济慈的诗歌风格.

sentences.en: The third resonantly poetic language of Scotland this century is Gaelic.
sentences.cn: 盖尔语是本世纪苏格兰第三种富有诗意的语言。

sentences.en: There is a poetic quality to her playing.
There's a very rich poetic tradition in Gaelic.
sentences.cn: 盖尔语有非常深厚的诗歌传统。

words.tran_cn: 诗的，诗歌的；诗意的；诗人的

trans.tran_cn: 诗的，韵文的，有诗意的，诗人的
trans.tran_en: relating to poetry, or typical of poetry
